meanings.definition: To surpass in figuring out or understanding.
meanings.sent1: She was outfiguring her classmates in solving the math problem.
meanings.sent2: The detective was outfiguring the criminal's next move.
meanings.sent3: The young detective was outfiguring the old inspector in solving the case.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition was outfiguring the logic in making sense of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's curiosity was outfiguring all obstacles in discovering the truth.

meanings.sent1: He was outfiguring the cost of the project before presenting it to the team.
meanings.sent2: The engineer was outfiguring the weight distribution of the bridge.
meanings.sent3: The child was outfiguring the number of candies left in the jar.
meanings.sent4: Her quick mental math was outfiguring the need for a calculator.
meanings.sent5: The farmer was outfiguring the amount of feed needed for the livestock.

meanings.definition: To plan or arrange the outfit or appearance of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She was outfiguring her outfit for the party.
meanings.sent2: The stylist was outfiguring the models for the fashion show.
meanings.sent3: The robot was outfiguring its appearance for the disguise.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was outfiguring the traditional fashion norms.
meanings.sent5: The interior designer was outfiguring the layout of the room.
